snippet.title: Dave.EXE: V3.0 - Mechs, Mercs, N' Madness | Update #6 OUT NOW!!!
snippet.description:
Dave.EXE's Mechs, Mercs, N' Madness update is out now! A major stepping stone for the game's development, for we have reached the halfway point and thus boosted our way to V3.0! Experience four brand new enemies and random events, a new location that takes place deep in the snowy mountains, new climbing mechanics and all manner of changes, fixes and more! Come and give Dave.EXE's newest early access build a shot, only on Patreon.


Special thanks to Padre Snowmizzle for making the trailer ► https://twitter.com/PadreSnowmizzle


Snag The Dave.EXE Mercs, Mechs N' Madness Update, only on Patreon! ► https://www.patreon.com/posts/80663471


My Twitter! ► https://twitter.com/The_Toonimator


My Website! ► https://davemicrowavesgames.wixsite.com/davemicrowavesgames


My Merch! ► https://teespring.com/stores/the-microwave-merch-shop


#DaveEXE #AroundTheClock #AroundTheClockatBikiniBottom #DaveMicrowavesGames #PadreSnowmizzle
